Package contents:
  - ChangeLog.txt: log of changes.
  - contents.txt: this file.
  - doc: folder containing the rCUDA user guide.
  - framework: rCUDA server and library.
  - framework/common: common library files for both rCUDA library and server middlewares.
  - framework/rCUDAd: the rCUDA server daemon.
  - framework/rCUDAl: the rCUDA interception library of NVIDIA Runtime library.
